shortdesc.ph: The configuration of the low-quality video stream.

p.codeblock: public class SimulcastStreamConfig { public VideoEncoderConfiguration.VideoDimensions dimensions; public int bitrate; public int framerate; }

__attribute__((visibility("default"))) @interface AgoraSimulcastStreamConfig: NSObject @property (assign, nonatomic) int bitrate; @property (assign, nonatomic) int framerate; @property (assign, nonatomic) CGSize dimensions; @end
struct SimulcastStreamConfig { VideoDimensions dimensions; int bitrate; int framerate; SimulcastStreamConfig() : dimensions(160, 120), bitrate(65), framerate(5) {} } };

plentry.pd: The video dimensions, see . The default value is 160 Ã— 120.
Video receive bitrate (Kbps), represented by an instantaneous value. The default value of the log level is 5.
The frame rate (fps) of the video. The default value is 5.
